character.statement: I knew I chose the best tribe.
You may have beaten us at sea, but now we'll whoop you on land!
Hail to the Wildfire! We raised the Poptropolis Games!

exchange.question: Late? For what?
exchange.answer: For the games, of course! The Poptropolis Games occur but once every 100 years. We mustn't keep the fans waiting.

exchange.question: What are the Poptropolis Games?
exchange.answer: You don't know? All the tribes of Poptropica send a champion to compete in a series of sporting events. Win, and you'll be a hero of your tribe for all time!

exchange.question: What happens if I lose?
exchange.answer: Not much--just eternal shame and dishonor. So, are you ready?

exchange.question: I'm ready!
exchange.answer: Splendid! Head to the Coliseum to begin.

exchange.question: Not yet.
exchange.answer: Hmph. Well, don't dilly-dally. We've got to get going!

character.statement: Ah, our representative from [tribe]. You're late!
I couldn't believe my eyes--the city of Poptropolis rose right up from the sea!
My parents and grandparents never got to see the Poptropolis Games, but I do!
Once and for all, we'll find out which of the Poptropica tribes is the best!
